page.title: 04GOWY VALLEY GOVERNMENT
page.content: {1981 CENSUS}Barrow 855,Guilden Sutton 1654,Littleton 612.All villages have 3 tiers of government.{Parish Councils} administer street lighting, recreation sites,public footpaths, allotments. {Chester City Council}administer housing,rating,planning,refuse collection, public transport & public facilities.{Cheshire County Council}is responsible for education,police & fire services,roads,waste disposal, social services and travelling library {POLITICS}the area is predominately Conservative.Elections are held for all 3 councils and for the local Members of the British and European Parliaments.{COMMUNICATIONS}in the area are good, few homes are without a telephone, each village has a Post Office, pay phones and daily collection & delivery of mail.
